statements: SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT id, name FROM policyholders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT id, contact_details FROM policyholders WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id > 5 AND id < 10;
SELECT id, name, address, LEFT(contact_details, 5) AS contact_prefix FROM policyholders WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT id, name, CONCAT(address, ', ', contact_details) AS full_info FROM policyholders WHERE name = 'Alice' OR name = 'Bob' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM policyholders;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM Policyholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, contact_number FROM Policyholders WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT policy_id, policyholder_id, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policies ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, address, contact_number FROM Policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT policyholder_id, COUNT(*) as total_policies FROM Policies GROUP BY policyholder_id;
SELECT name, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policyholders JOIN Policies ON Policyholders.id = Policies.policyholder_id;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM Policyholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT policyholder_id, address, contact_number FROM Policyholders WHERE contact_number='1234567890';
SELECT * FROM PolicyholderPolicies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM PolicyholderPolicies WHERE policy_type='Life Insurance';
SELECT * FROM Policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM Policyholders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT policy_id, start_date, end_date FROM PolicyholderPolicies WHERE policy_type = 'Health' AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pc.claim_id, pp.policy_type, pc.claim_amount FROM PolicyholderClaims pc JOIN PolicyholderPolicies pp ON pc.policy_id = pp.policy_id;

SELECT ph.name, pp.policy_type, pc.claim_amount FROM Policyholders ph JOIN PolicyholderPolicies pp ON ph.policyholder_id = pp.policyholder_id JOIN PolicyholderClaims pc ON pp.policy_id = pc.policy_id ORDER BY pc.claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM policyholder_policies WHERE policy_id = 10;
SELECT policy_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM policy_claim ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_payments WHERE policy_id = 5 AND payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance' AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT ph.name, pp.policy_type, pc.claim_date FROM policyholders ph JOIN policyholder_policies pp ON ph.id = pp.policyholder_id JOIN policy_claim pc ON pp.policy_id = pc.policy_id WHERE pc.claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT pp.policy_type, SUM(pa.payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM policyholder_policies pp LEFT JOIN policy_payments pa ON pp.policy_id = pa.policy_id GROUP BY pp.policy_type;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details WHERE policy_id = 100;
SELECT policy_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE policy_id IN (100, 101);
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, description FROM claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, address FROM policyholders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM policyholders JOIN policy_details ON policyholders.id = policy_details.policy_id;
SELECT beneficiary_name, relationship FROM beneficiaries WHERE relationship = 'Spouse';
